text:
For `crm.record.sidebar` or `crm.record.tab`
is not into the private app scopes. You need to change it into the file `example-card.json` into your code editor
Hi, I think you are discussing CRM development beta, and it's only available to Sales or Service enterprise hubs

Passing personally identifiable information as url parameters is not really a great idea, is against the google analytics terms of service, and can create a GDPR nightmare. I would go back to the hyros team and ask if there is a way to achieve what you want to do without passing an email address as a url parameter (as email addresses are personally identifiable information).

Is it possible for me to build a CRM card public app to go on the contact page without a sales enterprise hub? I donâ€™t need the card to go within the overview tab of the contact, within the right sidebar as discussed with Pierrick is fine
Are buttons and text fields within contact crm cards in the right sidebar only possible to develop using an enterprise account?
